XenotypeDef.label: titans
XenotypeDef.description: Titans is more powerful and deadly than Hussars.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Titans is more powerful and deadly than Hussars.

XenotypeDef.label: eternals
XenotypeDef.description: The Eternals is a nearly perfect xenohuman that has been carefully transformed. Powered by archites, their abilities go far beyond normal genetic enhancements. They are physically strong and preternaturally beautiful.They don't age or die naturally and never suffer from disease.A Eternal can make a new Eternal by reimagining their own xenogerm into a person.\n\nThe executives of Galaxy Trade Group have transformed themselves into Eternals, with the goal of forever controlling the company and surviving in critical situations.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: The Eternals is a nearly perfect xenohuman that has been carefully transformed. Powered by archites, their abilities go far beyond normal genetic enhancements. They are physically strong and preternaturally beautiful.They don't age or die naturally and never suffer from disease.A Eternal can make a new Eternal by reimagining their own xenogerm into a person.\n\nThe executives of Galaxy Trade Group have transformed themselves into Eternals, with the goal of forever controlling the company and surviving in critical situations.
